transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please record your message. When you have finished recording, you may hang up.
Speaker A: Hi Grace, this Ishika from Amber Student and this call is regarding your accommodation you are searching in London. Let me know your convenient time to connect with you or else you can reach out to me on WhatsApp. Thank you.
Speaker A: Available. At the tone, please record your message. When you have finished recording, you may hang up.

Speaker B: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please record your message. When you have finished recording, you may hang up.
Speaker A: Hi Grace, this is Ayeshika from Ambus Student and this college. Regarding your recommendation, you are searching in London so you have filled the form for this Wellmsley studio. So the property has sent the offer on your email. So kindly check your offer over there and just proceed ahead with clicking View your agreement section. If any query or any challenges, feel free to call me on this number or you can just reach out to me on an email as well. Thank you.

Speaker B: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please record your message. When you have finished recording, you may hang up.
Speaker A: Hi Grace. This Ishika from Amber Student. You have recently initiated the booking process for this property called Valmy Studios. So the property has sent out the offer via email. You can just check your email. Today is the last day of the offer. If you're interested, you can proceed ahead with the booking process. Thank you. Have a good day.
Speaker A: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is.
Speaker A: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available at the tone.
Speaker A: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available at the tone.
